thread.title: Alabama Court Defines Embryos as Children, A Funeral “Desecrates" St. Patrick's, and Mrs. Grossman’s Stickers - Breakpoint
thread.title_full: Alabama Court Defines Embryos as Children, A Funeral “Desecrates" St. Patrick's, and Mrs. Grossman’s Stickers - Breakpoint

author: John Stonestreet; Maria Baer
title: Alabama Court Defines Embryos as Children, A Funeral “Desecrates" St. Patrick's, and Mrs. Grossman’s Stickers - Breakpoint
text: [Articles](#) Alabama Court Defines Embryos as Children, A Funeral “Desecrates” St. Patrick’s, and Mrs. Grossman’s Stickers John and Maria discuss the implications for IVF of an Alabama court ruling. 02/23/24 [John Stonestreet](https://breakpoint.org/author/john-stonestreet/) [Maria Baer](https://breakpoint.org/author/maria-baer/) John and Maria discuss the implications for IVF of an Alabama court ruling. And what a recent funeral at St. Patrick’s Cathedral means for Western culture and the church. Topics [Abortion/ Value of life](https://breakpoint.org/tag/abortion-value-of-life/) [Alabama](https://breakpoint.org/tag/alabama/) [Christian Worldview](https://breakpoint.org/tag/christian-worldview/) [Family](https://breakpoint.org/tag/family/) [IVF](https://breakpoint.org/tag/ivf/) [LGBT](https://breakpoint.org/tag/lgbt/) [Politics & Government](https://breakpoint.org/tag/politics-government/) [Science/Nature/Creation/Technology](https://breakpoint.org/tag/science-nature-creation-technology/) [St. Patrick’s Cathedral](https://breakpoint.org/tag/st-patricks-cathedral/) [Transgender](https://breakpoint.org/tag/transgender/) Resources: Recommendations [A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens](https://colsoncenter.christianbook.com/tale-of-two-cities/charles-dickens/9780141439600/pd/439602?event=ESRCG) Segment 1: Alabama Judge Rules in Favor of Embryos [Frozen embryos are ‘children,’ Alabama supreme court rules in couples’ wrongful death suits ](https://www.al.com/news/mobile/2024/02/frozen-embryos-are-children-alabama-supreme-court-rules-in-reviving-couples-wrongful-death-suits.html) [Three Alabama clinics pause IVF services after court rules that embryos are children ](https://www.nbcnews.com/health/health-news/university-alabama-pauses-ivf-services-court-rules-embryos-are-childre-rcna139846) Segment 2: A Funeral “Desecrates” St. Patrick’s Cathedral [Desecration at St. Patrick’s Cathedral ](https://www.firstthings.com/web-exclusives/2024/02/desecration-at-st-patricks-cathedral) Have a Follow-up Question?
